des: "A creamy dip that gives you a tiramisu flavor without the hassle! Serve with biscotti or thin cookies (such as Anna's Swedish cookies)."
ins: Stir cream and coffee granules together in a bowl until dissolved. Add mascarpone cheese, confectioners' sugar, and vanilla extract; beat on low speed using an electric mixer until mixed. Increase speed to high and beat until soft peaks form; transfer to a serving bowl. Sprinkle chocolate over dip.
